name: maple syrup.inc
description:
play on scratch!:

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/566288245/

letsplay:

maple syrup.inc is a game developed for itch.io's great autumn game jam. 

 how to play: click on the bucket when the bucked is dripping with maple sap.

the maple sap will be cooked in the campfire automatically.

then, go to the shop and sell your maple syrup for money!

you cannot do anything with the money yet.

(the money is the score.)
